sentences.en: He was much weakened constitutionally by the disease.
sentences.cn: 那场病使得他体质大大减弱。

sentences.en: The technique consists of injecting healthy cells into the weakened muscles.
sentences.cn: 这项技术包括把健康细胞注射进衰弱的肌肉里。

sentences.en: The recession has weakened so many businesses that many can no longer survive.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退削弱了很多企业的实力，以至于很多无法再生存下去。
